nodes.text: The M-TD Series translator droid was a repulsorlift-equipped interpretation droid capable of speaking its owner's language and a select few other languages specified by the owner. It lacked the full TranLang III communications module of the more-capable 3PO-series protocol droid. It was ideal for those who could not afford a full protocol droid, or for those who sought a more compact or mobile translator.
Like 3PO units, M-TD translator droids were equipped with a computer interface port and shutdown switch.
One unit from this line was Em TeeDee, owned by the young Jedi Lowbacca.
